set term png
set key top left
set key box
set output "memory-usage.png"
set xlabel 'No. of log lines / 1000'
set ylabel 'Memory (Mb)'
plot 'memory-usage-fs.write.log'  using ($1/1000):($2/1000000) title 'fs.write' with lines, \
       'memory-usage-fs.writeStream.log' using ($1/1000):($2/1000000) title 'fs.writeStream' with lines
